text: James Russell Capps (February 26, 1931 - October 6, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the North Carolina General Assembly from 1994 to 2006.Biography: J. Russell Capps at VoteSmart He was born in Raleigh, North Carolina. He lost his re-election campaign in 2006. He unsuccessfully ran again in 2012. Capps died on October 6, 2020 in Raleigh at the age of 89.James Russell Capps, longtime NC lawmaker, dies at 89 ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:1931 births Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:People from Raleigh, North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: J. Russell Capps
